runs.comm: full on leg stump, a hint of inswing, and it's clipped through square leg for an opening single
length ball on off stump, punched firmly from the crease to cover

slower ball looks to be turned to leg, a big looping leading edge travels towards mid-off, is it over his head? No! What a catch. Corey Anderson leaps back with his left hand and clings on to a fine grab, Mills strikes early. A little away shape deceived Hales who was looking to clip into the on side but he got it wrong
full and wide of off stump, Lumb leaves it alone
length on a tighter line, dabbed out from the crease to point
tight line again and Lumb can only find point, a lovely opening over from Mills
full on off stump, Moeen drives it leisurely to mid-off
touch shortly length allowing Moeen to flick it wide of mid-on, what timing on this, a glorious stroke sails away from the fielder
similar length but a touch wider, Moeen mistimes a cover drive and finds a gap a mid-off for a quick single
full on the pads, it takes a flick past the short long leg but doesn't quite have enough on it to get it to the rope, the run hard for three
bumper, was it leg side, not quite, height okay too, Moeen played no stroke
full angled in, Moeen aims leg side and misses, struck on the pad, it would have slid down leg, no chance of a leg bye into cover
back of a length on middle and leg, tucked through square leg for an easy single
full just wide of off stump, swing and a miss from Moeen
good length at the off stump, Moeen forward playing out towards point
Moeen down the pitch, Mills saw him coming and throws it wide, too wide, of off stump
flowing drive on the up and manages to clear mid-off, decent strike and enough elevation to clear the fielder
touch short on off stump and Moeen is back onto it quickly, pulling right off the meat of the bat over cow corner
gorgeous stroke, full blade through the line of a full-ish delivery on the stump, Moeen timed it to perfection back down the ground, you could watch that all day, perfect
short and hammered square on the off side, picks out deep square so just a single
lapped into the leg side, didn't get all of it but safely into the gap, short of the deep man
Lumb aims leg side with a big heave but gets a thick inside edge to short long leg
full delivery, slower ball, Lumb chips it down the ground, not sure he picked it but went overt the bowler's head to good effect and almost timed it all the way for six
this is shorter and Lumb is hit on the body trying to pull hard to leg
back of a length just outside off, Lumb misses trying to force it over the covers
short and pulled for four wide of midwicket, poor ball well put away
another short ball, this a touch straighter and Moeen puts it away again, this square of midwicket, very poor again from Southee, wrong length me old china
fuller now, Moeen drives and times it perfectly but didn't pick the gap past mid-off
slower and full outside off, Moeen gave himself room and had to reach for it, gets some bat on it down to third man
another short one and Lumb whacks it over midwicket into the stand, oh dear Timbo
touch fuller and Lumb, giving himself some room, forces off the back foot through cover for a couple
Moeen steps across his stumps and tries to paddle a length ball past short long leg, can't do but they steal a sharp single
full at the leg stump, clipped down to long-on
full down the leg side, Moeen goes to swing it away and misses
step down the wicket, tries to swing a length ball a foot outside off through the covers and misses, ended up reaching for it a little
shifts to the off side and this time manages to get the pick up shot away over short long leg, it goes pretty fine and bounces twice into the rope
down the wicket and a swing towards the off side again, misses again
Moeen aiming off side again and misses a length ball just outside off
full at the leg stump, clipped out to long-on
touch short outside off, Moeen slaps it hard in the air but doesn't find deep-backward point
full toss on middle and leg and Lumb sweeps it nicely past short long leg, put away well
full at the stump, Lumb plays a glorious cover drive with an open face to steer it past deep cover, that it timed and placed to perfection
straight drive now, the bowler able to field
middle and leg line, Lumb tucks it out to deep midwicket
touch short and wide enough to cut, Lumb times it nicely and carves it past backward point
down the track trying to flick over the off side, gets an inside edge into the pad that runs into the off side for a quick single
pulled leg side, it wasn't that short, and Moeen mistimed it high on the bat down to long-on
full at the pads, flick leg side misses, takes some pad to the leg side and they run a quick single

back of a length and pulled leg side, Moeen hasn't got all of this and picks out deep square leg that is a bad way to go when well set, holing out into the deep and providing New Zealand with some much-needed respite. Nice knock from Moeen but not enough England will feel but he's set up a nice platform
punch through cover, deep cover has to run to his left and they get a couple
full length a foot wide of off stump, left alone
leaves another just outside off
Morgan shuffles across his stumps now and plays from a foot and a half outside off through the leg side for just a single as midwicket scrambles well

full delivery driven into the off side, not timed and it squirts down to third man, in comes Anderson with a dive and takes the catch diving down low, another fine catch from Anderson, that was not easy at all against the floodlights and dewy grass. A second set England batsman goes
length just outside off, Morgan leaves a third ball in the over
tighter line, dabbed down from the crease into the off side and they get a quick single
off stump line, blocked
a shimmy down the wicket, ends up yorking himself, dug out to the bowler
sweeps and misses at a ball that slides down leg
steps to leg and cut hard wide of deep cover for a couple
fuller at the leg stump, run down to long-on and they sprint back hard to two as the ball rolled slowly into the outfield
full at the leg stump, dabbed up on the leg side for a quick single
back and clipping with the spin through square leg for just the single
full just outside off, driven and squirts it past point, chase to his left for deep cover and they get two
this drive is straight out to the deep cover
full on off stump, slapped hard through the off side and, oh, there's no sweeper out at cover! Not sure where he's gone but that would have gone straight to him
short and pulled and very nearly carries it to long leg, the fielder didn't see it and might have been able to come forward to catch that had he seen it, managed to save four though
length ball on the stumps, blocked in the crease and they run a sharp single
well wide of off stump, left alone
touch of width outside off and slapped hard past extra cover, timed well and it finds the cover fence
low full toss on off stump, flicked to short midwicket who dives and saves nicely
swung from outside off and again, for some reason there's no long-on and that's four, weird field here again
steps back, a little too short to pull, mistimes this to midwicket
another full toss, long-on is now back and fields this but can't prevent two, very sharp running
full on the stumps, driven firmly back to the bowler
touch short, Morgan gets hit on the body trying to pull

Morgan down the wicket, reaches out for a slower ball and can't change his stroke and chips a catch to mid-off. Another tame dismissal, Morgan's slippery form continues and Southee has returned to take a crucial wicket
full down the leg side
straighter line, Bopara dabs it to leg and they get a quick single
bumper, well-directed, Buttler sways inside the line
another short ball and again, Buttler is getting himself out of harms way
good yorker-length just wide off stump, dug out back to the bowler
starts with a wide down leg
full length just outside off, forward and ran into a gap square on the off side for an easy single
back of a length, pulled but mistimes through square leg, actually turns out okay because it rolls slowly into the deep and they get back for two
full at the stumps, pushed down to long-on
forward press outside off, Bopara get a thick inside edge past his stumps, so nearly dragging that on trying to run it down to third man, ends up getting a run to long leg
length ball just wide enough of off stump to allow Buttler to punch it out wide of deep cover for a couple
fuller and driven straight to the deep cover this time
excellent yorker just outside off stump, Buttler looks to dig it out and misses
steps across his stumps and scoops to good effect but the man is back at long leg and scrambles well to save the boundary, excellent work
length ball a foot outside off, Bopara guides it down to third man
another scoop, this to a shorter ball but this time Buttler gets more on it and it's fine enough of the deep fielder to get it for four
low full toss just outside off, slapped only to extra cover
full outside off again, this is carved wide of third man and Kyle Mills's dive isn't in time
length ball dropped calmly into the off side and they run like whippets to get back for two
slower ball on off stump, just blocked back to the bowler
full just outside off, flicked down to long-on

full ball wide of off stump, Buttler reaches out for it and manages to drag it into his stumps that's a big blow for England. Buttler a little unlucky perhaps but didn't move his feet to this at all, getting a thick edge into middle stump
full on the stumps, Jordan forward just blocking this
full delivery, firm drive down to long-off
short ball, pulled and gets an inside edge into midwicket for a single
oh dear, dropped by Ronchi, regulation nick from Bopara, straight to the keeper at chest height but he let it slip and then missed with a bowl at the stumps that could have been a run-out
full ball just outside off, Bopara shuffles out of his ground and swings it very nicely over long-off, lovely strike
forward just outside off and just blocking this to point
tries to pull from just outside off and cloths it to mid-on
short and well wide of off stump
another short ball, Jordan pans it down the ground and, oh that is a nice whack, big one over long-off
full and flicked through midwicket for a sharp couple, good running
full toss and swept hard but only to deep-backward square
driven from outside off straight to extra-cover
full delivery, Jordan gives it a whack down the ground but picks out long-on it was another firm strike but not far enough and Southee able to take a simple chance a few yards in from the boundary
back and angling out to deep point for an easy single
full outside off, Bopara tries to swing it away but misses
full just outside off, chopped into the covers
nice delivery again, full and wide and Bresnan can only chop it down to third man
full again, dug out down to long-on
lovely full length again, Bresnan reaches across for it and digs it out into the covers

full toss, swing out over the off side, Anderson is preparing himself for a third catch, he reaches up with his right hand but this time can't hold on to a tough chance and spills it on the bounce into the rope
not quite on the length outside off and Bresnan drives it up and over extra cover for four, well timed
swing from outside off, comes off a thick inside edge wide of long-on so they run hard for two
low full toss, slapped back down the ground, they take on long-off running in for the second and get back again
full on the off stump, driven hard down the ground but this time too quickly to long-off and it's just one
not quite a yorker and Bresnan able to swing it down the ground, good hit and gets it over the rope, a good slug
wide and full, just a single out to deep cover
excellent yorker-length just outside off, chopped hard to deep cover, just one
